game.logic

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.logic.Player
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PlayerMP

    public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a player in the game. This class should do the player logic and not have anything to do with the client/ server.
    Author:
    Cameron Bryers 300326848 MMXV, Callum Gill 300316407 2015
